mapper.select: select s.instid, s.instindex, s.document_id, s.labelnum, it.itid, it.itemcontent, it.itemindex, it.instance_id, it.labelnum itemlabelnum from instance s left join item it on s.instid=it.instance_id where s.document_id=#{docId} ORDER BY s.instid

select s.instid, s.instindex, s.document_id, s.labelnum, it.itid, it.itemcontent, it.itemindex, it.instance_id, it.labelnum itemlabelnum, di.dotime,di.comptime,di.dtstatus, dtr.labeltype, dtr.label_id from instance s left join item it on s.instid=it.instance_id left join task_document td on s.document_id =td.document_id left join d_task dt on dt.task_id=td.task_id left join d_instance di on (di.dtask_id=#{dTaskId} and s.instid=di.instance_id) left join dt_relation dtr on dtr.dt_id =di.dtid where s.document_id=#{docId} ORDER BY s.instid

select s.instid, s.instindex, s.document_id, s.labelnum, it.itid, it.itemcontent, it.itemindex, it.instance_id, it.labelnum itemlabelnum, di.dotime,di.comptime,di.dtstatus, dtr.labeltype, dtr.label_id from instance s left join item it on s.instid=it.instance_id left join d_instance di on (di.dtask_id=#{dTaskId} and s.instid=di.instance_id) left join dt_relation dtr on dtr.dt_id =di.dtid where s.document_id=#{docId} and (di.dtstatus =#{status} or di.dtstatus is null) ORDER BY s.instid
mapper.insert: insert into dt_relation (dtd_id, dt_id, labeltype, label_id) values (#{dtdId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dtId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{labeltype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{labelId,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into dt_relation (dt_id,labeltype,label_id) values
( #{dt_id},#{labeltype},#{item} )
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE labeltype = values(labeltype)
mapper.select: select dtd_id, dt_id, labeltype, label_id from dt_relation
